translations: v.符合（conform 的 ing 形式）；遵照

sentences.sentence: Equipment not conforming to official safety standards has all been removed from the workshop.
sentences.translation: 不符合官方安全标准的设备已全部从车间撤走。

sentences.sentence: Not conforming also means not conforming with yourself or your past.
sentences.translation: 不循规蹈矩意味着不屈服于你自己或你的过去。
